mapper.select: SELECT D.recipe_seq, D.recipe_nm, D.recipe_sumry, D.recipe_nation_nm FROM tb_recipe D, (SELECT A.irdnt_code AS IRDNT_CODE FROM tb_refrigerator A INNER JOIN tb_user B ON A.refri_user_seq = B.user_seq AND B.use_yn = 'Y' INNER JOIN tb_irdnt_cd_grp C ON A.irdnt_grp_code = C.cd_grp_id AND A.irdnt_code = C.cd_id WHERE B.user_seq = #{user_seq} ) E WHERE D.irdnt_code = E.IRDNT_CODE GROUP BY D.recipe_seq HAVING COUNT(D.irdnt_code)>=3

SELECT G.recipe_seq, G.recipe_nm, G.recipe_sumry, G.recipe_nation_nm, F.cooking_no, F.cooking_dc FROM tb_cooking F, (SELECT D.recipe_seq, D.recipe_nm, D.recipe_sumry, D.recipe_nation_nm FROM tb_recipe D, (SELECT A.irdnt_code FROM tb_refrigerator A INNER JOIN tb_user B ON A.refri_user_seq = B.user_seq AND B.use_yn = 'Y' INNER JOIN tb_irdnt_cd_grp C ON A.irdnt_grp_code = C.cd_grp_id AND A.irdnt_code = C.cd_id ) E WHERE D.irdnt_code = E.irdnt_code GROUP BY D.recipe_seq HAVING D.recipe_seq = #{recipe_seq} ) AS G WHERE F.recipe_seq = G.recipe_seq ORDER BY G.recipe_seq, F.cooking_no;
